meaning_str.bing:
n. 救援；抢救；营救；获救
v. 抢救；营救；援救
网络. 解救；拯救；挽救

救援；营救；解救；拯救；挽救；挽回；拯救于危难之中
救援；救助；解救；营救；援救；抢救；拯救行动；紧急援助

1.en: Speculation mounted ahead of a summit of European Union leaders that Greece would be offered some sort of financial rescue package.
1.cn: 在欧盟领导人即将举行峰会之际，越来越多的人预测欧盟将向希腊提供某种财政援助计划。

2.en: Shaak Ti was one of the 200 Jedi that traveled to Geonosis on a mission to rescue captives from the growing Separatist forces.
2.cn: 她也是前往吉奥诺西斯的200名绝地之一，受命去解救那些被新崛起的分离主义军队所俘的同伴。

3.en: We Gyptians have been hurt more than most by these child thieves. -I need to go North with you, and help rescue those kids.
3.cn: 这些偷小孩的强盗，我们杰普顿人是深受其害。--我得跟你一起去北方，帮助你救出那些孩子。

1.en: Yippee. To the rescue. To the rescue. Look. There's Danny and Granddad Dog. Hooray.
1.cn: 走咯。去救援咯！去救援咯！看！丹尼和他爷爷来了。太好了。

2.en: Granddad Dog speaking. I see. Don't panic, Mummy Sheep. I'm on my way. To the rescue. Can I go, too? Hop aboard. Peppa. To the rescue.
2.cn: 你好，我是狗爷爷。我知道了。别慌张，羊妈妈。我马上就来。去救援咯。我能一起去吗？上来吧，佩奇。我们去救援咯。

3.en: I'll pass you onto the next rescue service. Hello, fire service. I'm stuck in the mud. Can you rescue me, please?
3.cn: 我帮你转给下一个救援的人吧你好，消防队我被困在泥里了，你能来救我吗?

4.en: OK, I'm on my way. It is Miss Rabbit in her rescue helicopter. Hello, everyone. Let's rescue this tortoise.
4.cn: 好的，我马上就到。兔子小姐驾驶着她的救援直升机来了。各位你们好！我这就把乌龟救下来！

5.en: Peppa and her family have come to the summer fete. Look, I display rescue vehicles.
5.cn: 佩奇和他的家人来到了夏日游园会。看，那里有救援交通工具的展示。

6.en: You are a tortoise. Don't worry Daddy Pig, I'll pass you onto the highest rescue service in the land.
6.cn: 你可是一只乌龟啊。别担心猪爸爸我帮你转给我们最高救援级别的人。

7.en: Hello. Look. Polly Parrot is flying off to the balloon. Polly Parrot to the rescue. Go Polly, go.
7.cn: 你好！看，鹦鹉波利飞去抓气球了！鹦鹉波利去救援。加油，波利，加油！

8.en: Now, can we chop the tree down? No. We'll have to call the highest rescue service in the land.
8.cn: 现在我们可以把树砍到了吗？不行，看来我们只有找本地最高级的救援服务了。

9.en: We are telling you now, because we finally have communication with him, and a viable rescue plan.
9.cn: 我们现在告诉你们，是因为我们终于跟他取得联系，也有了可行的救援方案。

10.en: So, I understand that you all were part of the fifty-eighth rescue squadron staged over at Bagram in Afghanistan for combat search and rescue. Yes, madam. Two tours.
10.cn: 我知道你们都隶属于驻扎在阿富汗巴格拉姆军事基地的五十八号救援分队，执行空中巡逻营救任务。是的，女士，去过两次。

11.en: Hello, Suzy, we've come to rescue you. Hooray. Granddad Dog is filling the tire with air. Thank you. Granddad Dog.
11.cn: 你好啊，苏西。我们提供救援了。太好啦。狗爷爷在往轮胎里面充气。真是太谢谢你啦。

12.en: This is the sound fire engine makes. And Miss Rabbit is showing her rescue helicopter. This is the sound my helicopter makes.
12.cn: 我的消防车发出的声音是这样的。还有兔小姐展示的是救援直升机。我的直升机发出的声音是这样的。

13.en: Daddy Pig has set off the noisy house alarm. The noisy house has woken everyone up. It's Miss Rabbit in her rescue helicopter.
13.cn: 猪爸爸不小心启动了吵闹的报警器。吵闹的房子把大家都吵醒了。是兔小姐开着他的救援直升机来了。

14.en: Well, that didn't work, did it? What are we going to do now? Chop the tree down. No. I'll call the next rescue service.
14.cn: 啊，消防队也没有办法了。那么我们现在该怎么办呢？我们把树给砍倒啊！不行！我给另一个救援中心打电话吧。

15.en: Maybe we should land now. Emergency. Emergency. Calling rescue helicopter. I'm on my way. You're in luck. We've got a job to do.
15.cn: 我们差不多该降落了吧。紧急情况！紧急情况！紧急呼叫救援直升机！好，马上就到，你们真幸运，我们要去执行任务了！

16.en: Miss Rabbit runs the ice-cream store, the recycling center, the library. She drives the train, the fire engine, flies a rescue helicopter and works the supermarket check-out.
16.cn: 兔子小姐运营着冰淇淋店，回收中心，图书馆！她开着火车，开消防车，开救援飞机以及在超市收银。

17.en: Miss Rabbit runs the ice-cream store, the recycling center, the library. She drives the train, the fire engine, flies a rescue helicopter and works the supermarket check-out.
17.cn: 兔子小姐运营着冰淇淋店，回收中心，图书馆！她开着火车，开消防车，开救援飞机以及在超市收银。

18.en: It's contingent. The minister won't proceed with our tariff deal if we don't give him assurances that the rescue is underway. Why do the Chinese care so much about what's on this Russian boat?
18.cn: 这事得视情况而定。如果希望部长继续关税交易，我们必须向他保证救援已经开展。中方为何如此关心这艘俄罗斯船上有什么？

19.en: It was Jeff and Donna and Sheila and Doreen and all of the passengers, the rescue workers, air traffic control, ferry boat crews and the scuba cops. We all did it. We survived.
19.cn: 是杰夫和堂娜，希拉和多琳，所有的乘客、救援人员空管人员，轮渡船员，还有警局，潜水小队，我们都尽了一份力我们这才得以幸存。
